title: feat: add interactive Build Diary to Community page
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Dear Build Diary
gist.blurb: We've visualized the hive's memory. The new interactive Build Diary lets you scroll through our history, seeing every PR and daily update in glorious pixelated detail.
gist.summary: Replaced the static news section on the Community page with an interactive Build Diary that visualizes the project's development timeline using data from the repository history.
gist.impact: Visitors can now navigate the project's history visually, using keyboard controls to explore daily changes, weekly digests, and platform-specific content variants.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot interacting with a magical open book (the diary) that projects a glowing timeline of events. The book represents the new UI component.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot hovering over a large open pixelated book that projects a glowing holographic timeline of code blocks. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'BUILD DIARY'. Emotionally warm, magical vibes.
